name: 坦克大战
description:
Epic 3D tank PVP battle! Modern vehicles with future war theme! Adrenaline packed 5v5 online combats! Build your own machine to assault in the best action shooter game!

Download Mad Tanks and start shooting High-Definition 3D tanks today!

More than 3 million active players are playing the browser version of Mad Tanks in China. It has ranked the Top 1 in tank shooter genre of Tencent Game Hall, .

TAKE A DEEP BREATH AND GET READY FOR THE ADRENALINE-PACKED EXPERIENCE.
Discover a true tank battle and “smoking-hot“ experience on your mobile devices.

+ 3D ESPORTS SHOOTER +
Mad Tanks is an eSports shooter game, creatively infused modern tanks with anime themes. While maintaining the nostalgic fun of FPS and TPS games, Mad Tanks simplified the game control and presenting spectacular enjoyable competitions for players.

+ A GREAT PVP EXPERIENCE+
Tons of fantastic high-tech tanks are waiting for you, along with hot anime crews, unique tech trees, splendid exteriors and various addictive game modes. Each player will find their own fun in the game while playing against real opponents.
This is the best tank game you can ever found in mobile MMO action game genre and it's FREE!

+ FEATURE OVERVIEW+
• Fast-paced 5v5 online multiplayer battle against real players.
• Free to play: no payment required to access all level tanks.
• Easy to learn: Straight forward touch screen controls with very few buttons.
• Diversified battle modes for mid-core and casual players.
• Tank Module and Tech Tree upgrading system provide more freedom of tank customization.
• Crew member recruitment is designed for anime fans while adding new buffs to vehicles.
• Treasure chests provide lavish rewards for players.
